Create a shoe customization service where customers can choose from a variety of materials and designs to personalize their own shoes.
Develop a shoe repair app that allows users to fix common issues such as loose laces or worn out soles on their own.
Design a line of eco-friendly shoes made from recycled materials and sold at affordable prices.
Launch a shoe rental service for special events or occasions, allowing customers to rent high-end designer shoes without having to purchase them permanently.
Create a shoe museum showcasing famous鞋的设计和历史，吸引鞋迷参观。
